hero.title: Door‑to‑Door Sales Teams
hero.text: We provide ethical, data‑driven door‑to‑door outreach that turns knocks into customers — serving the telecom, energy, home‑service and non‑profit sectors.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive door‑to‑door outreach tailored to your campaign goals.

items.title: Door‑to‑door sales teams
items.description: Boost conversions with our elite door-to-door sales teams. Our fully trained brand ambassadors deliver ethical, face-to-face outreach that turns knocks into customers across Canada. From prospecting to closing, we handle every step, maximizing your ROI while safeguarding your brand’s reputation with data-driven scripts and compliant sales practices.

items.title: Targeted regional outreach
items.description: Reach the right households at the right time. We overlay demographic, postal-code, and utility data to build laser-focused canvassing zones, ensuring hyper-local coverage across Canada.

items.title: Real‑time reporting and performance tracking
items.description: Stay in control! Track visits, conversions, and agent KPIs live from any device, integrate results with your CRM, and receive automated performance alerts. Transparent metrics empower you to optimize offers, adjust territories, and scale winning tactics instantly, keeping your campaign ahead of the competition.

items.title: Non‑profit Campaigns
items.description: We conduct ethical door‑to‑door fundraising and awareness campaigns that resonate at the doorstep, building long‑term donor relationships for your NGO. Amplify your mission with our purpose‑driven door‑to‑door fundraising teams.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: A simple, repeatable framework refined over hundreds of door‑to‑door campaigns.

steps.title: Recruit
steps.text: We hand‑pick background‑checked reps who fit your brand’s culture and meet all compliance requirements.

steps.title: Train
steps.text: Role‑play, product deep dives, and objection handling. Our training is tailored to your unique process and goals.

steps.title: Deploy
steps.text: Teams roll out across your target regions with GPS check‑ins and live scripts.

steps.title: Report
steps.text: Real‑time dashboards, daily recaps, and API feeds straight to your CRM.

items.problem: House-by-house consent was mandatory before fibre-optic construction in Toronto and Ottawa could begin, yet mailers and digital notices failed to reach every resident.
items.solution: TDX fielded neighbourhood-mapped door-to-door teams that explained the project, addressed construction concerns, and captured signed consent in a mobile CRM for real-time tracking.
items.result: 100 000+ households visited and a 90 % homeowner consent rate, enabling the build to start on schedule without costly delays.

about.title: Who We Are
about.text: Founded in 2019, TDX Solution has helped partners engage over 120 000 households across Canada. Our mission is to build honest human connections at the doorstep while delivering real‑time, data‑rich results to our clients.
about.missionText: To empower brands and communities through respectful door‑to‑door conversations that turn neighbours into loyal customers — all backed by transparent reporting and a pay‑for‑performance ethos.
